Package uk.ac.ncl.csc8002.coursework.part1.rental

Class RentalManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ncl.csc8002.coursework.part1.rental.RentalManager

  • public class RentalManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a rental manager holding information on a fleet of cars and who has rented each car.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RentalManager getInstance​()
        Static factory singleton method to get the instance of the rental manager to be used throughout the running of the software
        Returns:
        The static rental manager instance

      • TEST_newManager

        public static RentalManager TEST_newManager​()
        Static factory for use in testing only. Generates a new instance of the rental manager so each test can run independently without altering a singleton. In testing using the singleton means it is not reset on each test giving unpredictable results
        Returns:
        new rental manager instance

      • getRentedCars

        public java.util.List<Car> getRentedCars​()
        Creates a list of cars which have been rented. The cars are defensively copied when being added to the list, to protect the objects against misuse whether intentional or accidental. If no cars have been rented, an empty list is returned.
        Returns:
        List of Cars which have been rented

      • availableCars

        public int availableCars​(CarType typeOfCar)
        Method to check how many of a given car type are available for rent. Checks through the fleet of cars and checks the car type and whether it is rented or not.
        Parameters:
        typeOfCar - the type of car to check availability for
        Returns:
        the number of available cars

      • getCar

        public Car getCar​(DriverLicense license)
        Method to get the car being rented by a particular driver. The method checks the map of rentals and returns the car associated with that driver. If no car is rented then null is returned. The actual car object being rented is returned in this case with the intent that this object can then be driven and interacted with.
        Parameters:
        license - the license of the driver associated with the car
        Returns:
        car rented by the driver

      • issueCar

        public boolean issueCar​(DriverLicense customer,
                        CarType carType)
        Method to issue a car to a given driver and checks eligibility of driver for the given car. A driver can only rent one car at a time. The driver must hold a full license. For Small cars the driver must be over 21 and have held their license for at least 1 year. For Large cars the driver must be over 25 and have held their license for at least 5 years.
        Parameters:
        customer - the driver license of the person who wants to rent a car
        carType - the type of car requested to be rented
        Returns:
        true if the issuing of a car was successful

      • terminateRental

        public int terminateRental​(DriverLicense driverLicense)
        Method to terminate a rental for a given driver and return how much fuel is required to fill the tank of the car.
        Parameters:
        driverLicense - License of person returning the car
        Returns:
        whole litre value of fuel needed to fill the tank of the car
